name: Cultist
uniques: May enter foreign tiles without open borders, but loses [250] religious strength each turn it ends there
Can be purchased with [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion]

civilopediaText.text: The Luria Federation is known for its worship of middle-aged semi-famous women. This cultist is one of them. They usually carry a few folders and sometimes hard drives containing images of their preferred semi-famous women, such as Anne Hidalgo.
